problem.story:
You have 100 vocabulary words to learn. Day 1: you review 20 words. Some stick, some don't. Day 2: you should review the ones you struggled with, but which ones were those? By week 2, you're lost - do you review all 100 again?

With Remember, our SM-2 algorithm tracks your progress. Hard words? Review tomorrow. Easy words? Review next week. You'll never waste time on words you already know, and you'll never forget the ones you're learning.

step1.title: 1. Rate Yourself
step1.description:
Easy = 5 points
Completely forgot = 1 point
AI learns your difficulty level

step2.title: 2. Calculate Timing
step2.description:
Hard words = Review more often
Easy words = Review less often
Each word has its own schedule

step3.title: 3. Perfect Review
step3.description: Review when you're "about to forget" Not too early, not too late Save time, remember longer
